command_group: az iot central device edge manifest

commands.name: az iot central device edge manifest show
commands.summary: Get the deployment manifest associated to the specified IoT Edge device.
commands.syntax:
az iot central device edge manifest show --app-id
                                         --device-id
                                         [--central-api-uri]
                                         [--token]
examples: az iot central device edge manifest show --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceId}
